markdownRemark.html:
“First, take a person who meditates observing not-self in all things. They perceive not-self and experience not-self. Constantly, continually, and without interruption, they apply the mind and fathom with wisdom. …”

AN.7.19. Nibbānasutta (“Extinguishment”)

children.value: “First, take a person who meditates observing not-self in all things. They perceive not-self and experience not-self. Constantly, continually, and without interruption, they apply the mind and fathom with wisdom. …”
